title: Smart Data Models - TotalHeatExchanger schema
description: Information on TotalHeatExchanger (maker, model, specification, etc.).

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `TotalHeatExchanger`.

classificationCode.description: Property. Classification code of this item.

dateObjectCreated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The registration date and time of this item as an object.

dateObjectUpdated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The update date and time of this item as an object.

effectiveHumidifyingAmount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Effective humidifying amount of this item.

exteriorShape.description: GeoProperty. Exterior shape of this item.

flagDeleted.description: Property. Flag set when this item is deleted as an object.

groupNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Group number of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyExtraHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when set amount of wind is extra high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when set amount of wind is high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyMiddle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when set amount of wind is middle of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyLow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when set amount of wind is low of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when cooling of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyCoolingExtraHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when cooling and set amount of wind is extra high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyCoolingHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when cooling and set amount of wind is high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyCoolingLow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when cooling and set amount of wind is low of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when heating of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyHeatingExtraHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when heating and set amount of wind is extra high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyHeatingHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat exchange efficiency when heating and set amount of wind is high of this item.

heatExchangeEfficiencyHeatingLow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.  Heat exchange efficiency when heating and set amount of wind is low of this item.

idModel.description: Property. Model id or number of this item.

mnetAddress.description: Property. Mnet address of this item.

objectName.description: Property. Name of this item as an object.

powerConsumptionExtraHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when set amount of wind is extra high of this item.

powerConsumptionHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when set amount of wind is high of this item.

powerConsumptionMiddle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when set amount of wind is middle of this item.

powerConsumptionLow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when set amount of wind is low of this item.

powerFrequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power frequency of this item.

processableAirQuantity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Processable air quantity of this item.

processableAirQuantityExtraHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Processable air quantity when set amount of wind is extra high of this item.

processableAirQuantityHigh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Processable air quantity when set amount of wind is high of this item.

processableAirQuantityMiddle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Processable air quantity when set amount of wind is middle of this item.

processableAirQuantityLow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Processable air quantity when set amount of wind is low of this item.

price.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Price of this item.

refAirConditionerTerminal.description: Relationship. Reference to the air conditioner terminal containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the air conditioner terminal containing this item.

refElectricPowerEquipment.description: Relationship. Reference to the electric power equipment containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the electric power equipment containing this item.

refGatewayController.description: Relationship. Reference to the gateway controller containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the gateway controller containing this item.

refTotalHeatExchangerMentenanceMeasureme.description: Relationship. Reference to the total heat exchanger mentenance measurement containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the total heat exchanger mentenance measurement containing this item.

refSensor.description: Relationship. Reference to the sensor containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the sensor containing this item.

refSpace.description: Relationship. Reference to the space containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the space containing this item.

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.  Serial number of this item.
